mi:PackageInformation.name: Composite.Media.ImageGallery.Facebook

mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: To show a full-size image in a Facebook album in a light box on your website, we recommend that you install Composite.Media.ImageGallery.Slimbox2.
